description:
Someone is trying to take over the Damashigami Company! Later, when Renge tries to steal Annette`s Peep Ball, she sees a vision of Kain... putting handcuffs on her?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai Ikkai Kumiai Taikai / Imarishiki Yogen
La première assemblée syndicale – L`abominable prédiction
The First Union Meeting / An Ominous Prophecy
第一回組合大会 / いまわしき予言
